name: Battle Rollers
description:
Battle Rollers is a turn-based, arcade dungeon crawler that lets you battle enemies by rolling your dice! With endless floor generation, try to beat your high score and last as long as you can. Choose your upgrades and your path wisely, you could lose everything quicker than you think...



  • 6 types of enemies with unique artificial intelligence
  • 2 playable characters with unique stats and play styles
  • Procedural, endlessly generating floors
  • Original artwork and music
